name: Tokyo OG
description: Tokyo OG, originating from Northern California, is yet another rendition of the famous OG Kush hybrid. This cutting preserves the traditional OG aroma that blends lemon and pine with a distinctive diesel bite. Indica characteristics shine through in this phenotype, offering a dense, chunky bud structure and relaxing effects that help many consumers put to sleep anxiety, pain, and stress. However, novices beware: Tokyo OG oftentimes boasts a staggeringly high THC content that can exacerbate anxiety rather than alleviate it.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Sleepy, Stress, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Headaches, Depression, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Anxious
